2104.04842.sentence: However, designing an effective interview chatbot is non-trivial.
2104.04842.label: Background

2104.04842.sentence: Few tools exist to help designers design, evaluate, and improve an interview chatbot iteratively.
2104.04842.label: Background

2104.04842.sentence: and offer design suggestions for improving the chatbot based on such metrics.
2104.04842.label: Background

2104.04842.sentence: Recent studies show the effectiveness of interview chatbots for information elicitation.
2104.04842.label: Result

2104.04842.sentence: Based on a formative study and literature reviews, we propose a computational framework for quantifying the performance of interview chatbots.
2104.04842.label: Objective

2104.04842.sentence: To validate the effectiveness of iChatProfile , we designed and conducted a between-subject study that compared the performance of 10 interview chatbots designed with or without using iChatProfile .
2104.04842.label: Result

2104.04842.sentence: Conversational AI Agents; Interview Chatbot; Chatbot Debugging; Chatbot Evaluation Framework; Chatbot Design Suggestion; Automatic Chatbot Profiling; Automatic Chatbot Evaluation
2104.04842.label: Result

2104.04842.sentence: Incorporating the framework, we have developed iChatProfile , an assistive chatbot design tool that can automatically generate a profile of an interview chatbot with quantified performance metrics
2104.04842.label: Result

2104.04842.sentence: Based on the live chats between the 10 chatbots and 1349 users, our results show that iChatProfile helped the designers build significantly more effective interview chatbots, improving both interview quality and user experience.
2104.04842.label: Result
